title: Drawing, "Two Decorartive Studies of Ceilings; Verso: Studies of Heads", 1814–18
title_raw: Two Decorartive Studies of Ceilings; Verso: Studies of Heads
medium: Pen and ink, brush and watercolor washes over graphite on laid paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Two decorative studies of ceilings; three candelabra; frieze with shaft and emblem; Verso: barbarian head in profile; barbarian with cornucopia details from antique

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Two Decorartive Studies of Ceilings; Verso: Studies of Heads", 1814–18. Pen and ink, brush and watercolor washes over graphite on laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-2375.
